about_the_game:
The Rise of the Golden Idol - Detective Pass gives you access to all four upcoming Investigations DLC releasing in 2025 at a discounted price. Additionally, it includes the The Rise of the Golden Idol - Soundtrack, featuring the complete music collection for the game composed by Paul Alexander.

More Information

Investigations #1 - The Sins of New Wells

Follow Detective Roy Samson through four brand new cases of his dealings with an organized crime syndicate plaguing the city. Drugs, death, and ancient Lemurian magic will make headlines in The Sins of New Wells.

ARRIVING Q1 2025

Investigations #2 - Codename [REDACTED]

Travel to Lemuria and investigate a deep reaching conspiracy that has infiltrated the upper echelons of Lemurian aristocracy and its King. Mingle with new age cults from India, gurus with potentially supernatural powers and charlatans that just want to scam westerners in Codename: [REDACTED].

ARRIVING Q2 2025

Investigations #3 - Codename: Inquisition

When reports of the unlawful use of Lemurian technology begin to surface, an inquisition squad is sent to investigate - but are they truly immune to the Idol’s influence? Explore a world before modern technology and catch a glimpse at the world during the creation of the artifact itself in Codename: Inquisition.

ARRIVING Q2 2025

Investigations #4 - Codename: Expedition

Set shortly after the events of The Case of the Golden Idol, follow a group of explorers as they set off on a seafaring adventure to discover a fabled and supposedly cursed treasure of a lost pirate captain. It’s all hands on deck in Codename: Expedition.

ARRIVING Q3 2025

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features freeze-frame depictions of murder crime scenes rendered in a 2D art style.

There are visual or text references to alcohol and tobacco use.
